## ElementView interface

A View representing DOM nodes specifically for rendering the view of a custom element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ElementView extends View 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [appendTo(node)](./fast-element.elementview.appendto.md) | Appends the view's DOM nodes to the referenced node. |
